alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 9:34PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Payette, north central Canyon, southern Gem and south central Washington Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 933 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Letha, or 11 miles west of Emmett, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Letha around 940 PM MDT. French Corner around 950 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River
